sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaTrophy, FaCertificate, FaMedal, FaStar, FaAward, FaGraduationCap, FaCode, FaExternalLinkAlt, FaDownload, FaEye, FaCalendarAlt, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaUsers, FaLaptopCode, FaRobot, FaShieldAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Achievements.css'; const Achievements = () => { const [selectedAchievement, setSelectedAchievement] = useState(null); const achievements = [ { id: 1, title: 'Dean\'s List Recognition', category: 'academic', year: '2023', issuer: 'University of Technology', description: 'Consistently maintained academic excellence with a GPA of 3.8/4.0, earning recognition on the Dean\'s List for outstanding academic performance.', icon: , color: '#8E9AAF', certificate: '/certificates/deans-list-2023.pdf', verification: 'https://university.tech/verify/deans-list-2023' }, { id: 2, title: 'AWS Cloud Practitioner', category: 'certification', year: '2024', issuer: 'Amazon Web Services', description: 'Earned AWS Cloud Practitioner certification demonstrating foundational knowledge of AWS Cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.', icon: , color: '#FF9900', certificate: '/certificates/aws-cloud-practitioner.pdf', verification: 'https://aws.amazon.com/verification' }, { id: 3, title: 'Google Cloud Fundamentals', category: 'certification', year: '2023', issuer: 'Google Cloud', description: 'Completed Google Cloud Fundamentals course covering core infrastructure and platform services, security, and management tools.', icon: , color: '#4285F4', certificate: '/certificates/google-cloud-fundamentals.pdf', verification: 'https://cloud.google.com/certification' }, { id: 4, title: 'First Place - Hackathon 2023', category: 'competition', year: '2023', issuer: 'University Tech Society', description: 'Won first place in the annual university hackathon for developing an innovative AI-powered educational platform that helps students learn programming.', icon: , color: '#FFD700', certificate: '/certificates/hackathon-winner-2023.pdf', verification: 'https://university.tech/hackathon-2023' }, { id: 5, title: 'Machine Learning Specialization', category: 'certification', year: '2023', issuer: 'Coursera - Stanford University', description: 'Completed comprehensive machine learning course covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and best practices for applying ML algorithms.', icon: , color: '#2E8B57', certificate: '/certificates/ml-specialization.pdf', verification: 'https://coursera.org/verify/ml-specialization' }, { id: 6, title: 'Cybersecurity Excellence Award', category: 'recognition', year: '2023', issuer: 'Computer Science Department', description: 'Recognized for outstanding contributions to cybersecurity research and development of network monitoring tools for threat detection.', icon: , color: '#DC143C', certificate: '/certificates/cybersecurity-excellence.pdf', verification: 'https://university.tech/cs-awards-2023' }, { id: 7, title: 'Python Programming Expert', category: 'certification', year: '2023', issuer: 'HackerRank', description: 'Achieved expert level in Python programming with 5-star rating, solving complex algorithmic challenges and data structure problems.', icon: , color: '#3776AB', certificate: '/certificates/python-expert.pdf', verification: 'https://hackerrank.com/certificates/python-expert' }, { id: 8, title: 'Best Research Paper', category: 'academic', year: '2023', issuer: 'Student Research Symposium', description: 'Received best research paper award for work on "Machine Learning Applications in Natural Language Processing for Educational Technology".', icon: , color: '#9370DB', certificate: '/certificates/best-research-paper.pdf', verification: 'https://university.tech/research-symposium-2023' }, { id: 9, title: 'IoT Innovation Challenge Winner', category: 'competition', year: '2023', issuer: 'Tech Innovation Hub', description: 'Won the IoT innovation challenge for developing a smart home automation system using Arduino and machine learning for energy optimization.', icon: , color: '#20B2AA', certificate: '/certificates/iot-innovation-winner.pdf', verification: 'https://techhub.innovation/iot-challenge-2023' }, { id: 10, title: 'Leadership Excellence', category: 'recognition', year: '2023', issuer: 'Student Affairs Office', description: 'Recognized for outstanding leadership in organizing coding workshops, mentoring programs, and fostering a collaborative learning environment.', icon: , color: '#FF69B4', certificate: '/certificates/leadership-excellence.pdf', verification: 'https://university.tech/student-affairs-awards' } ]; const categories = [ { key: 'all', label: 'All Achievements', icon: , count: achievements.length }, { key: 'academic', label: 'Academic', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'academic').length }, { key: 'certification', label: 'Certifications', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'certification').length }, { key: 'competition', label: 'Competitions', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'competition').length }, { key: 'recognition', label: 'Recognition', icon: , count: achievements.filter(a => a.category === 'recognition').length } ]; const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('all'); const filteredAchievements = activeFilter === 'all' ? achievements : achievements.filter(achievement => achievement.category === activeFilter); const openAchievementModal = (achievement) => { setSelectedAchievement(achievement); }; const closeAchievementModal = () => { setSelectedAchievement(null); }; const getCategoryIcon = (category) => { const icons = { academic: , certification: , competition: , recognition: }; return icons[category] || ; }; const getCategoryColor = (category) => { const colors = { academic: '#8E9AAF', certification: '#CBC0D3', competition: '#EFD3D7', recognition: '#EBCEE5' }; return colors[category] || '#8E9AAF'; }; return (

Achievements & Certifications

Recognition of my hard work and dedication

Filter Achievements

{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{filteredAchievements.map((achievement) => (
{achievement.icon}
{achievement.category} {achievement.year}

{achievement.title}

{achievement.issuer}

{achievement.description}

Download
))}

Interested in my qualifications?

Download my complete resume or get in touch to discuss opportunities.

View Resume Contact Me
{/* Achievement Modal */} {selectedAchievement && (
e.stopPropagation()} >
{selectedAchievement.icon}

{selectedAchievement.title}

Category: {selectedAchievement.category}
Year: {selectedAchievement.year}
Issuer: {selectedAchievement.issuer}

Description

{selectedAchievement.description}

Download Certificate Verify Online
)}
); }; export default Achievements;
